prompt: <description>Part 1: A rectangular prism with rounded corners and edges Construct a rectangular prism with rounded corners and edges. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with no rotation or translation. 1. Draw the first face of the prism by creating a loop with four lines: - Line 1: Start Point (0, 0), End Point (0.25, 0) - Line 2: Start Point (0.25, 0), End Point (0.25, 0.05) - Line 3: Start Point (0.25, 0.05), End Point (0, 0.05) - Line 4: Start Point (0, 0.05), End Point (0, 0) 2. Add two circular loops to the same face, one at the top left corner and one at the top right corner, with radii of 0.0125 and centers at (0.05, 0.025) and (0.2, 0.025), respectively. 3. Scale the sketch by 0.25. 4. Transform the scaled sketch into a 3D sketch using the Euler angles [0, 0, 0] and translation vector [0, 0, 0]. 5. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.05 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite normal, resulting in a NewBodyFeatureOperation. Part 2: A cylindrical object with a slightly tapered end Construct a cylindrical object with a slightly tapered end. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with rotations of [-90, 0, -90] and a translation vector [0.25, 0, 0]. 1. Draw the circular face of the cylinder by creating a loop with a circle: - Circle: Center (0.025, 0.025), Radius 0.025. 2. Scale the sketch by 0.05. 3. Transform the scaled sketch into a 3D sketch using the Euler angles [-90, 0, -90] and the translation vector [0.25, 0, 0]. 4. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with an extrusion depth of 0.5 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite normal, resulting in a JoinFeatureOperation. The final shape should be a long, thin, metallic object with a pointed end and a hole in the middle, as described in the given JSON.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.25,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.25,0.0],"End Point":[0.25,0.05]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.25,0.05],"End Point":[0.0,0.05]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.05],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}},"loop_2":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.05,0.025],"Radius":0.0125}},"loop_3":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.2,0.025],"Radius":0.0125}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.05,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.25,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}},"part_2":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[-90.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.25,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.025,0.025],"Radius":0.025}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.5,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.05,"operation":"JoinFeatureOperation"}}}}
